鼚字的基本解释

鼚
chāng
鼓声：“鼚乎鼓之，轩乎舞之。”

鼚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chāng］
［《廣韻》禇羊切，平陽，徹。］
(1)鼓声。
(2)动貌。

鼚字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鼓字部】　鼚； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1526第28
【廣韻】褚羊切【集韻】抽良切，?音瞠。【玉篇】鼓聲。帝乃載歌，鼚乎鼓之，軒乎舞之。

鼚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鼚字的起名意思

暂无。

sound of drum
Basic explanation of words
sound of drum
chāng
Drum sound: "Falcon is like a drum, and Xuan is like a dance."
sound of drum

[①]［chāng］
["Guangyun" cut sheep, Pingyang, toru. ]

sound of drum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Drum Character Department] 　鼚; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1526 28
[Guang Yun] Chu Yangqie 【Jiyun】Pump a good cut,? The sound. [Jade articles] Drums. The emperor carries the song, the falcon is like the drum, and the xuan is like the dance.
